document_data.name: Hand of Bane
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hand of Bane''' was an [[artifact]] created by the [[Church of Bane|Banite priesthood]] to enable [[Bane]] to be resurrected, should the need arise.
document_data.Location: The hand was hidden in the city of [[Sigil]], in a former temple to Bane.
document_data.Description: The hand was carved from black [[obsidian]], about the size of an [[ogre]]'s paw. The fingers were curled upwards, with fingernails of red [[garnet (gem)|garnet]]. The hand was also studded with [[diamond]]s, giving it a poxy appearance.<ref>
document_data.Destruction: The hand was destroyed by [[Walinda]], a priestess of Bane, in the [[Astral Plane]].<ref> The pieces were later scattered throughout the [[planes]] by [[Holly Harrowslough]] and [[Joel]].<ref>
